text:
Lynn Cohen (born Lynn Harriette Kay; August 10, 1933 – February 14, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for playing Magda in the HBO series "Sex and the City" and the 2008 movie of the same name, as well as its 2010 sequel, and Mags in '. Cohen was born in Kansas City, Missouri.
Cohen died on February 14, 2020 in New York City, aged 86.
